ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
des: "This is a spinach dip for use in a bread bowl created by hollowing out the center of a round loaf of bread."
ins: In a mixing bowl, combine the sour cream, yogurt, spinach, onion flakes, Beau Monde seasoning (TM), garlic salt and hot pepper sauce. Chill until ready to serve.
